Reviews.Content: galaxy nice hotel tucked miles downtown amsterdam staff friendly helpful offer complimentary shuttle service city drops front drop excellent location walk various restaurants activities list tours clean modern mini fridge family short stay double beds double beds pushed appear king bed sheets separate fine definitely stay rate

Reviews.Title: “Brill hotel.”

Reviews.Content: stayed 4 3 nites nov stay movenpick thanks book arrived 2 reservation found hotel werent glad fab celebrating 1st wedding anniversary upgraded suite wonderful views staff friendly complimentary drinks sent 2 hotel isnt central courtesy bus leaves 20 mins drop central station cud def stay recommend thanks wonderful stay
